summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4061 for the improvement of the alley in block 3, McKenzie & Dempsey's Lake Washington Addition, and Block 20, Yesler and McGilvra's Addition, being the alley extending from East Union Street to a point about 65 feet north of East Spring Street; thence west to 37th Avenue and between 37th Avenue and 38th Avenue, by paving the same and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49008, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
